data.question: What is the chemical formula of the material that exhibits AAAA and ABAB packing of the sql layers?
Which polymorph of sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu has intrinsic 1D channels?
What is the maximum C3H6 productivity achieved by sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB from a 1:99 C3H4/C3H6 mixture?
What is the separation selectivity (αAC) for sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB in separating C3H4 from C3H6?
Does sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB exhibit higher C3H4 uptake compared to C3H6 at low pressure?
Is the adsorption enthalpy for C3H4 higher in sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB than in sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AA?
Can sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB selectively separate C3H4 from C3H6 at 298 K?
What method was used for the adsorption selectivity calculations?
What is the crystal system of sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB-α?
What technique was used to study the guest-induced structural change in sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB?
What is the role of the NbOF5 pillar in the structure of sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu polymorphs?
data.answer: It acts as an inorganic pillar to support the structure.

data.question: Why is sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB considered more effective for C3H4/C3H6 separation than sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AA?
data.answer: Because it has a higher separation selectivity and C3H6 productivity.

data.question: Is the adsorption of C3H4 in sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB faster than that of C3H6?
What is the significance of the transformation from sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB-α to sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB-β1?
data.answer: It indicates a phase change that could affect gas adsorption properties.

data.question: Does the sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB material retain its crystallinity after soaking in water?
What is the effect of temperature on the PXRD patterns of sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu polymorphs?
data.answer: Temperature changes can induce phase transformations, as observed in VT-PXRD patterns.

data.question: Can sql-NbOFFIVE-bpe-Cu-AB be regenerated and reused for gas separation?
What computational method was used to identify the most plausible binding sites for gas molecules?
What is the role of Canonical Monte Carlo simulations in the study?
data.answer: To confirm the main binding site locations for the adsorbates C3H4 and C3H6 in the frameworks.
